talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>
<html>{ui_string:257}</html>

$General Douglas$
Wait here until the scouts are done investigating on the Red Beard Island.

$General Douglas$
What a coincidence. The scouts who went to investigate the Red Beard Island say that a Nest has been formed there.

${user_nick}$
So what the Black Knight said was true.

$General Douglas$
Yes. It seems like Sepentra has turned into the Sea Dragon.
However, the scouts did not see anything that looked like Serpentra in that island. Instead, they saw a mountain of something unpleasant covered with a thin film.

$General Douglas$
The scouts say it was something like a reptile egg or a cocoon. I'm thinking it could be Serpentra's cocoon.

$General Douglas$
Serpentra has already attained the power of a dragon.
Being in a cocoon must be the last phase of becoming a complete Sea Dragon.

${user_nick}$
What would happen if Serpentra comes out of its cocoon?

$General Douglas$
I don't know. But my sixth sense tells me that...
we should kill it before it comes out of its cocoon.

${user_nick}$
Of course. (You don't need sixth sense to know that!)

$General Douglas$
Go back to Heraldry Scholar Stas and find out how to enter the Sea Dragon Serpentra's nest.
We must get rid of it before it comes out of its cocoon.

$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
I'm looking through every single book right now.
There must be a way to kill the Sea Dragon!

$Master Sorceress Stella$
The value of my lands plummeted all because of the Sea Dragon! Phew… I thought it hit rock bottom when the three-headed dog appeared...
What is General Douglas doing?!

$General Douglas$
I hope Heraldry Scholar Stas has found a way to get into the Sea Dragon Serpentra's nest.

$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
(Stas is reading a few scrolls at the same time)
Oh, {user_nick}. Welcome.
Have you conveyed my message to General Douglas?

${user_nick}$
Yes. He asked about how we can enter the Sea Dragon Nest.

$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
I was already researching on that.
But I have to start with the bad news.

${user_nick}$
Bad news?

$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
I heard that an Ancient Priest's Rune was used to enter the Black Dragon Nest. But that wouldn't work for the Sea Dragon Nest.

$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
The key of the nest should have the same sort of power as the nest's owner. Since the Black Dragon was created by the Ancients, the Ancient Priest's Rune could be used since it had the same sort of power as the Black Dragon.

$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
However, Sea Dragon is different. It's a mixture of Serpentra's own power, Gold Dragon's power, and even Black Dragon's power. It is complicated and tedious to find out about the properties of the Sea Dragon's power. Maybe I can find something out if I can analyse its blood, but no one can approach Serpentra now.

${user_nick}$
Then maybe I can help.

$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
You…?
Oh yes. You told me that you were covered with Sepentra's blood last time. Maybe analysing your blood will shed some light.

$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
First, take this message to Master Sorceress Stella.
(Stas gives you a piece of paper)

$Heraldry Scholar Stas${action:Talk}
Master Sorceress Stella will do the rest.
Hmm… Even if you need to go through something unpleasant, remember it's Stella and not me who's doing it to you.

$Master Sorceress Stella$
The land prices are so low.
(Stella sighs as she turns around to find you)
What is it, kid?

$Master Sorceress Stella$
Is this a love letter...?
I knew that old man was single.
When will my popularity ever go down.

${user_nick}$
What… (She is badly mistaken...)

$Master Sorceress Stella$
This is not a love letter.
What? He wants me to mix the essence of power to make a key for the Sea Dragon Nest? He always sends troublesome tasks to me.

${user_nick}$
I hope you can help...

$Master Sorceress Stella$
Well, whatever!
I was irritated by how much my land lost value because of that Sea Dragon anyway.
Hey, you!!

${user_nick}$
Yes?

$Master Sorceress Stella$
I need to analyse your blood first.
Give me your arm.

$Master Sorceress Stella$
(Stella takes out a straw that seems too big to be considered a syringe and mercilessly sticks it into your vein)

${user_nick}$
OWWWWWW!!!!!!!!!

$Master Sorceress Stella$
Don't act like a child…
Now, let me analyse your blood.

${user_nick}$
(I almost met Geraint in heaven…)

$Master Sorceress Stella$
Yaliyali ★ Yaliyo ♬ Yaliye ~ Yala ♤ Yay ~ ♥
(Stella chants a weird spell with a serious face)
It's done.

${user_nick}$
What was that just now?

$Master Sorceress Stella$
I just analysed your blood.
Can't you see?
You're a {user_class}, you should know better.

${user_nick}$
(What has that got to do with being a {user_class}…)

$Master Sorceress Stella$
Why are you so primitive? Don't you know how scientific my analysis is? Get blood, chant spell, and the analysis is over!

$Master Sorceress Stella$
Anyway, there are so many things mixed in your blood. What else would you need to make a key for the Sea Dragon's nest...

${user_nick}$
Huh?

$Master Sorceress Stella$
Well, you have all the necessary ingredients... Just how could you get the Key to the Nest from your blood so easily?

${user_nick}$
I don't know…

$Master Sorceress Stella$
Okay~☆
Now, shall I begin?
(Stella throws in your blood sample and some other weird ingredients you've never even seen or heard of before.)

$Master Sorceress Stella$
Abracadabra★ Mix♡it!
Abracadabra!!

$Master Sorceress Stella$
(The liquid bubbles up and turns black)
It's ready!!

${user_nick}$
This is it?

$Master Sorceress Stella$
What else do you need? I've put the ingredients in and chanted the spell.
Now, take this to Heraldry Scholar Stas.

$Master Sorceress Stella$
That old man can't do anything without my help. Hahaha!

$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
Did you get the mixture of power?!
(Stas asks urgently)

${user_nick}$
Yes. Is there something wrong?

$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
(Stas dips a crystal into the mixture)
Serpentra is awakening from its cocoon.

$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
It seems like its metamorphosis was completed while you were collecting the materials.
General Douglas wants you to head out to kill the Sea Dragon right away.

${user_nick}$
I should have moved more quickly…

$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
No one's blaming you.
(Stas takes the crystal out from the mixture)
Take this.

$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
Now, let’s go take down the Sea Dragon!
There’s a dark oracle waiting for you at Hermalte Port who will take you to the Sea Dragon Nest.

$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
You must have forgotten... The only person who can enter the Sea Dragon Nest is a person wit hthe key.
Careful!

※ The Sea Dragon Nest is a solo dungeon. You cannot complete this quest while in a party.

${user_nick}$
I'll make my way then...

$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
Be careful.
(You can get to the Serpentra Nest through Priestess Macaron at Hermalte Port)

$General Douglas$
I've sent a message to Heraldry Scholar Stas to ask you to head out to the Sea Dragon Nest as soon as the key is ready.

$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
Did you kill the Sea Dragon?!

$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
(Tell him what happened)
Hmm… Velskud appeared and killed the Sea Dragon with Geraint's sword…? And he absorbed Sea Dragon Serpentra's energy?

${user_nick}$
Why do you think Velskud appeared?

$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
Hmm…
(Stas thinks for a while)
Come to think of it, Velskud lost one of its wings during a fight with Geraint last time.

${user_nick}$
That's right.

$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
And the bishop used his wing to reawaken Serpentra. I'm guessing Velskud went there to recover what he lost in the battle with Geraint.

$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
But… the Sea Dragon must have had the Gold Dragon's power too apart from Black Dragon's power… Maybe what he absorbed was more than the power he had lost.

${user_nick}$
What do you mean…?

$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
He absorbed the Sea Dragon's power using Geraint's sword so maybe he absorbed Geraint's powers too.

${user_nick}$
No way…

$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
Serpentra is based on Black Dragon's energy so it would have been able to feel Velskud's presence. So someone was needed to attract Sea Dragon's attention, someone who was contaminated by Sea Dragon Serpentra's blood and that was probably you.

${user_nick}$
So... was I used this time again...?

$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
Though the fall of the Sea Dragon benefited Velskud, if it was not for you, the Sea Dragon wouldn't have been slayed. And you fought not for Velskud but for us.

$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
Come on, don't be so down. Now is the time to enjoy the victory.

$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
Quickly go and tell General Douglas that Sea Dragon is dead!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I'm not fit to be called a hero.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$General Douglas${action:Talk}
Hahaha!
Finally our hero is here!

$General Douglas$
What are you takling about? You are the hero who slayed
Sea Dragon Serpentra and saved Saint Haven!

${user_nick}$
But the person who killed Sea Dragon was…

$General Douglas$
Hush! I heard the story too.
But right now, the people are in need of a hero.

${user_nick}$
(………)

$General Douglas$
People will be more touched by the news that you slayed Sea Dragon rather than another dragon. Please don't say anyting to other people.

${user_nick}$
Okay.
<html>$Quest Reward$</html>

$General Douglas$
People love beautiful lies more than fearful truths. So you just have to act like Saint Haven's hero.
Don't let them down.

${user_nick}$
...... (It's hard to answer him)

${user_nick}$
Geraint....
I have finished taking the revenge for you.
I think that's all that I can do for you. Goodbye....

${user_nick}$
Geraint....
I have finished taking the revenge for you.
I guess hellos and goodbyes are all part of my Telesia. Pala Telesia....

${user_nick}$
Geraint.... Would this be enough to make you rest in peace?
I hope you can get eternal rest in the arms of the Goddess....

${user_nick}$
Geraint....
I have finished taking the revenge for you.
I did it only for YOU. It's rare that I work so hard without getting paid.... So... Rest in peace now....

${user_nick}$
The history has changed from what I know. Geraint... My heart is in pain of losing you.
I'm scared that everything will go wrong because of me. Velskud also seems to be disappointed in me.
But... But I killed the Sea Dragon with my own hands! For you!

${user_nick}$
Geraint, I lost you in front of my eyes like how I lost my teacher but...
Would this repay my debt a little?
...I want to meet those who have left once more. Teacher... and you...

${user_nick}$
Geraint... I still don't understand you. Well, it could be natural since I'm a human so I cannot understand a dragon like you...
I don't want to see unexpected deaths anymore.
I just hope you'll rest in peace.

${user_nick}$
Now… I should go to Lotus Marsh…

※ [Chapter 6: Fairy Star] You can accept the main quest when you have reached at least
a Character Level of 40.

journal.title: General Douglas's Story
journal.contents:
Talk to General Douglas.

Saint Haven Royal Castle - General Douglas

journal.title: Heraldry Scholar Stas's Method
journal.contents:
Go to Heraldry Scholar Stas and ask him about ways to enter the Sea Dragon Nest.

Saint Haven - Heraldry Scholar Stas

journal.title: Master Sorceress Stella's Knowledge
journal.contents:
Deliver Heraldry Scholar Stas's strange message to Master Sorceress Stella.

Saint Haven - Master Sorceress Stella

journal.title: The Last Step
journal.contents:
Talk to Heraldry Scholar Stas about the Sea Dragon.

Saint Haven - Heraldry Scholar Stas
journal.todo_msg: Go back to Stas and show him the mixture of power.

journal.title: Battle with Sea Dragon Serpentra
journal.contents:
Go to Sea Dragon Nest and defeat Sea Dragon Serpentra.

Priestess of Darkness Macaron (Hermalte Port) - Duel Sea Dragon Nest
journal.todo_msg: Go to Sea Dragon Nest and kill the Sea Dragon Serpentra.

journal.title: Sea Dragon's Death
journal.contents:
Velskud suddenly entered the battle and killed the Sea Dragon Serpentra. Go back to Saint Haven and tell Heraldry Scholar Stas what happened in the Sea Dragon Nest.

Saint Haven - Heraldry Scholar Stas
journal.todo_msg: Tell Heraldry Scholar Stas that the Sea Dragon is dead.

journal.title: Lie Sometimes
journal.contents:
Let’s tell General Douglas at the Saint Haven Palace of how you defeated Sea Dragon Serpentra.

Saint Haven Palace - General Douglas

※ The main quest of [Chapter 6. Fairy Star] is only available when you reach Character Level 40 or higher. Find the Quest NPC once you’ve reached Level 40.

[Warrior/Archer/Sorceress/Cleric/Kali/Lancea] Hermalte Port - Argenta’s Slave David NPC
[Academic] Lotus Marsh - Academic Station NPC
[Assassin] Lotus Marsh - Mailbox NPC
[Machina] Saint Haven - Xiao Long NPC
